/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the street, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with tall, leafless trees, their bare branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, adding a touch of architectural interest to the natural landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
